QuestData.Title: The Double Hozen Dare
QuestData.Description: There is a witch in the woods but no one believes me. She turned my friend Shin into jade!$b$bWe were all so scared we tried to run back but she sicced her big jade monsters on us. A bunch of my friends tried to get away by climbing trees.$b$bCan you help me save my friends?
QuestData.CompletionText: Where is Shin? I didn't see Shin.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you so much for helping find my friends. I still don't see Shin though...
